CVE-2017-0785.title: BlueBorne - Information Disclosure
CVE-2017-0785.description: Information disclosure vulnerability in Android Bluetooth stack

CVE-2017-1000251.title: BlueBorne - Linux Kernel RCE
CVE-2017-1000251.description: Remote code execution in Linux Bluetooth stack
CVE-2017-1000251.mitigation: Update Linux kernel to version 3.3 or higher

CVE-2018-5383.title: Bluetooth Pairing Vulnerability
CVE-2018-5383.description: Improper authentication in Bluetooth BR/EDR pairing
CVE-2018-5383.mitigation: Update firmware to support secure pairing only

CVE-2019-9506.title: KNOB Attack
CVE-2019-9506.description: Key Negotiation of Bluetooth vulnerability allowing encryption key size reduction
CVE-2019-9506.mitigation: Update to Bluetooth 5.2 or apply security patches

CVE-2020-9770.title: BLE GATT Vulnerability
CVE-2020-9770.description: Improper access control in BLE GATT services
CVE-2020-9770.mitigation: Implement proper GATT service access controls
